name: HnyB Insights
tag_list: hnyb, insights, market, research, social, media, reports, advertising, branding, computing, consulting, ecosystem, tools
overview:
HnyB Insights provide mission-critical Information, Research, Analysis, Strategy, and Knowledge solutions to clients across the globe.

HnyB Insights is a leading Intelligence & Knowledge Consulting group with global perspective with focus on Social Computing, Social Media, Social Technology and Social Networking in both Personal (or individual) and Enterprise (or business) segments. Based out of India, HnyB Insights is seen as a one-stop value-hub by its marquee clients helping them meet knowledge, information and intelligence challenges.

HnyB Insights works with some of the top organizations worldwide, delivering lasting value through its published reports as well as numerous client defined projects in the area of cutting edge Social Technology.

Working side-by-side in a collaborative environment with clients, HnyB Insights’ consultants focus on the efficient transfer of knowledge. HnyB Insights is an institution committed to provide vital knowledge resources on emerging field of Social Technology, enabling clients to reach pinnacle of professional success by leveraging Social Tools and Social Media.

Working with a host of blue-chip clients globally on complex issues has enriched HnyB Insights experience and assets.

Excellent network of consultants, industry experts, analysts and access to key sources of information enables HnyB Insights to provide unbeatable value and time-to-market in all the engagements.
